text: Durnyye (zhenshchiny) - durnym (muzh'yam), (Muzh'ya) besstyzhiye - besstyzhim (zhenam), Dobroporyadochnyye (zhenshchiny) - poryadochnym (muzh'yam), Khoroshiye (muzh'ya) - khoroshim (zhenam). Oni nevinny pered (zlom lyudskoy) molvy, (Allakh) prostit im (ikh nebrezhnost') I odarit nadelom blagorodnym
